com.adidas.sensors.api

Interface FitSmartHandle


  • public interface FitSmartHandle
    Interface for FIT SMART operations.
    Since:
    6/20/2016.

      • dualModeChangeZoneForAssessmentWorkout

        void dualModeChangeZoneForAssessmentWorkout(FitSmartDualModeSceneZoneCommandType commandType,
                                            com.adidas.micoach.batelli.controller.BatelliDualModeSceneZoneColor zoneColor,
                                            int durationInSeconds,
                                            int percentage)
        Send FIT SMART Workout dual mode zone change command.
        Parameters:
        commandType - - command type FitSmartDualModeSceneZoneCommandType
        zoneColor - - desired zone color BatelliDualModeSceneZoneColor
        durationInSeconds - - desired zone color BatelliDualModeSceneZoneColor
        percentage - - zone percantage regarding to all Assessment Workout zones.

      • shouldUpdateToFirmwareWithVersion

        boolean shouldUpdateToFirmwareWithVersion(String fwVersion)
        Check if the FIT SMART should be updated with the given version.
        Parameters:
        fwVersion - - firmware version
        Returns:
        true if it should be updated, false otherwise.

      • rebootDevice

        void rebootDevice()
        Reboot FIT SMART device.

      • isInDualMode

        boolean isInDualMode()
        Check if FIT SMART is in dual mode.
        Returns:
        true if in dial mode, false otherwise.

      • isPairedForTheFirstTime

        boolean isPairedForTheFirstTime()
        Check FIT SMART FTU.
        Returns:
        true if FIT SMART was paired for the first time.

      • wasTimeFormat12HBeforePairing

        boolean wasTimeFormat12HBeforePairing()
        Check FIT SMART time format before pairing.
        Returns:
        true if time was already set before pairing.
